official_title: Concurrent resolution expressing the sense of Congress that the President should curtail exports of goods, materials, and technology to any nation that restricts the flow of oil to the United States.

summary.text: Expresses the sense of Congress that the President should curtail exports of goods, materials, and technology to any nation that restricts the flow of oil to the United States.
